short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple plugin for download Lemon8`s image and video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Video Lemon8 plug-in can help users download videos and pictures on the Lemon8 web page, and can support setting whether to ask for the download location and whether to download multiple pictures.

Instructions for use ğŸ› ï¸
1. Install plugin ğŸ“¥: In the browser, click the plug-in store, search for "Download Video Lemon8", and click install.
2. Use function ğŸš€: Open the web version of Lemon8 (https://www.lemon8-app.com/feed/foryou), click to enter a post details page, and click the (Download/Download) button in the lower right corner of the picture or video. , just download it directly. You can also click the plug-in icon in the upper right corner to set the plug-in configuration.

Download Video Lemon8 Save your favorite pictures and videos locally!
